instruction-for-use.navodila-za-uporabo: Izdelek nanesite na suho kožo rok za redno vlaženje in nego.

ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Isononanoate, Hydrogenated CocoGlycerides, Olea Europaea Fruit Oil, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Carbomer, Sodium Hydroxide, Caprylyl Glycol, Myristic Acid, Arachidic Acid, Oleic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Linalool, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Geraniol, Parfum.
